titles.title: We Praise Thee, O God, Our Redeemer

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: With voices united our praises we offer, to Thee, great Jehovah, glad anthems we raise; Thy strong arm will guide us, our God is beside us, to Thee, our great Redeemer, forever be praise.
